Activity: Log in, check emails. Skim through relevant documentation on data quality metrics and database schema design related to healthcare data.

Draft an email to @da-1, @da-2, @dba-1, @his-1, and @his-2 to schedule a meeting to discuss initial data quality metrics for influenza-related data. Subject: Meeting Request: Data Quality Metrics Definition for Influenza Data.
Independent research on common data quality issues in EHR systems, specifically related to influenza diagnosis and treatment. Focus on understanding potential sources of error and inconsistency.
Lunch Break. Grab something quick and browse Reddit for interesting articles.

Prepare for the data quality metrics definition meeting. Compile a list of potential metrics based on prior research. Examples: Completeness of diagnosis codes, accuracy of vaccination dates, consistency of antiviral medication prescriptions.

Attend the meeting with @da-1, @da-2, @dba-1, @his-1, and @his-2. Actively participate in the discussion, contributing ideas for data quality metrics and understanding the rationale behind each suggestion. Take detailed notes.

Summarize the key outcomes of the meeting in an email and send it to all attendees (@da-1, @da-2, @dba-1, @his-1, @his-2). Subject: Summary of Data Quality Metrics Definition Meeting. Include the defined metrics, action items, and next steps.
